page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: In this area of the West end of Clevedon almost 7.5sq.km is the Bristol Channel including the {Blackstone Rocks}and mudland. 3.5 sq.km. is farmland.The farmland around is very flat.1 sq.km.is the{West End {of Cevedon. }In recent years there has been a lot of house building and new facilities such as shops,a school and a sports centre. Many people who live here travel to {Bristol}to work but now there are more jobs in Clevedon. The{Bristol Channel}is not very nice to swim in.It is used by Clevedon Sailing Club and large ships going to{ {Avonmouth Docks.} We get very low tides in Clevedon. Last year was the lowest tide for 50 years which was 14.7 metres.
